About Me

BIO

Hi! I'm a junior at Brown University studying Computer Science. Outside of CS, I love learning languages. From French to Italian to ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphs, language is my favorite way to learn about the world and explore different cultures. As I strive to find my path, I hope to combine my passions in CS, applied maths and languages.

In my free time, I love playing the ukulele, singing and acting.

Work Experience

Microsoft | Software Engineering Intern

May 2023 - August 2023

Microsoft | Explore Intern

May 2022 - August 2022

Worked with a 3-person team to design and build a web app that facilitates the process of performing user access reviews within the Controls and Compliance team. Established a pipeline between the UX and the database that allows users to retrieve and perform operations on data and make API calls. Built user authentication with Azure Active Directory; defined authorization rules based on security groups. Led the interface design process by drafting the design and development specification docs.

Brown University | Undergraduate TA

September 2021 - May 2022

Re-designed projects and homework and implemented solutions from scratch. Held debugging hours, conceptual hours, and lab sections weekly. Graded projects and homework and answered student questions on Ed.
